citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS and IDALS Officials during the inspection process at
5:50pm on 06/01/2016.
Inspectors arrived at the facility at 5:50pm and spoke with the licensee who stated that he was not available for the
inspection. The inspectors then left the facility.
Additional Inspectors
Cole Heather, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
